sentences.en: "Will Joe be here at Christmas?" — "I expect so."
sentences.cn: “圣诞节时乔会来这里吗？”——“我想会的。”

sentences.en: [as noun]our obsession with &B{the here and now}.
sentences.cn: 我们满脑子的此时此刻。

sentences.en: Come here for a minute.
sentences.cn: 到这里来一下。

sentences.en: Come on over, we've got lots of the old gang here.
sentences.cn: 过来吧，好多老朋友都在这儿。

sentences.en: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.cn: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: Fox, badger, weasel and stoat are regularly seen here.
sentences.cn: 狐狸、獾、黄鼠狼和白鼬在这里很常见。

sentences.en: He'll be here to see you any moment now.
sentences.cn: 他马上就会来这儿看你。

sentences.en: here's to us!.
sentences.cn: 祝我们成功！。

sentences.en: here's to your safe arrival.
sentences.cn: 为你安全到达干杯。

sentences.en: I thought, "Here'ssomeone who'll understand me." So I wrote to her.
sentences.cn: 我想：“这个人会理解我的。”于是开始给她写信。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: It's here that we come up against the difference of approach.
sentences.cn: 正是在这一点上我们遇到方法上的分歧。

sentences.en: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

sentences.en: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.cn: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

sentences.en: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.cn: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.en: September is here, bringing with it a chill in the mornings.
sentences.cn: 9月到了,早晨已有了寒意.

sentences.en: Shall we eat here?
sentences.cn: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.en: She called her young son: "Here, Stephen, come and look at this!"
sentences.cn: 她喊她的小儿子：“喂，斯蒂芬，过来看看这个!”

sentences.en: She'll crucify me if she finds you still here.
sentences.cn: 如果她发现你还在这儿，她会狠狠地教训我。

sentences.en: small bushes scattered here and there.
sentences.cn: 四处都有零落稀疏的小灌木。

sentences.en: Spring is here at last.
sentences.cn: 春天终于来临。

sentences.en: Students often travel hundreds of miles to get here.
sentences.cn: 学生常常赶数百英里的路来到这里。

sentences.en: The problem is compounded by the medical system here.
sentences.cn: 这儿的医疗体制使问题进一步恶化。

sentences.en: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.cn: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.en: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.cn: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.en: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: we're going to settle this here and now.
sentences.cn: 我们将立即处理这事儿。

sentences.en: What are you doing here?
sentences.cn: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.en: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.cn: 今晚你回这里吗？

phrases.tran_cn: 点击这里，点击此处；单击此处
［表示某人即将开始困难或兴奋的事情］要开始了
飘忽无常；很快结束（或忘记）的；短暂的
（尤指讨厌的事情又发生了）我们又倒霉了；又来了
［举杯祝健康或成功］祝…健康，祝…成功，为…干杯
无关紧要的或不相干的

trans.tran_cn: 在这里，这时，在这一点上，（给某人东西或指出某物时说）
